bibliography:
Ahmed, Mafizuddin, 1989, Bertrand Russell’s Neutral

Alter, Torin and Yujin Nagasawa (eds.), 2015, Consciousness in

Avenarius, Richard, 1888/1890, Kritik der Reinen

Lockwood, Michael, 1981, “What Was Russell’s

–––, 1894, Populärwisschenschaftliche

–––, 2012, Mind and Cosmos: Why the

–––, 2015, “Consciousness, Physicalism,

–––, 2006, “Consciousness as Existence as

–––, 1914b, “On the Nature of

–––, 1914c, “On the Relation of Sense-Data

–––, 1917, Mysticism and Logic, London:

–––, 1918b, “On Sensations and

–––, 1921, The Analysis of Mind,
Reprinted: London: George Allen & Unwin, 1978.

–––, 1924, “Logical Atomism”, in
J.H. Muirhead (ed.), 1924. Reprinted in Russell 1956c:
321–343.

–––, 1927a, The Analysis of Matter,
London: George Allen & Unwin.

–––, 1927b, An Outline of Philosophy,
London: George Allen & Unwin.

–––, 1931, The Scientific Outlook,
2nd edition, London: Unwin Books 1949.

–––, 1946, “Reply to My Critics”, in
Schilpp 1946: 679–741.

–––, 1948, Human Knowledge. Its Scope and

–––, 1956a, “Mind and Matter”, in

–––, 1956b, Portraits from Memory,

–––, 1956c, Logic and Knowledge. Essays

–––, 1959, My Philosophical
Development, London: George Allen and Unwin.

–––, 1986, The Philosophy of Logical Atomism

252–55.

Sayre, Kenneth, 1976, Cybernetics and the Philosophy of

–––, 2014, “Dualism, Dual-Aspectism, and
